Uses of Interface
net.derquinse.common.i18n.Localized

  • Packages that use Localized 
    Package Description
    net.derquinse.common.i18n  

    • Uses of Localized in net.derquinse.common.i18n

      Classes in net.derquinse.common.i18n that implement Localized 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractLocalized<T>
      Skeletal implementation for localized objects.
      class  BundleLocalized<T>
      A localized objects backed by a resource bundle.
      class  ForwardingLocalized<T>
      An abstract base class for implementing the decorator pattern for localized values.
      class  LocalizedMessage
      A localized formatted message.
      class  Unlocalized<T>
      Adapter for language-independent or unlocalized values.

      Returns the backing delegate instance that methods are forwarded to.

      Builds a localized value.
      static <T> Localized<T> LocalizedValues.fromStringMap(T defaultValue, Map<String,? extends T> values)
      Builds a localized map.
      static Localized<String> LocalizedValues.parse(Annotation annotation, String value, String values)
      Parses a custom annotation.
      static Localized<String> LocalizedValues.parse(L7dString value)
      Parses a L7dString annotation.
      static <T> Localized<T> LocalizedValues.withFallback(Localized<T> value, T fallback)
      Wraps a localized value with another that provides fallback value.
